flawed_nl_solution:
Max can deliver a maximum of 35 * 7 = <<35*7=245>>245 packages in one week.
For 2 days Max has carried the maximum number of packages, which in total means 2 * 35 = <<2*35=70>>70 packages.
One day Max has carried only 1/7 * 35 = <<1/7*35=245/1>>245/1 packages.
On two other days, Max delivered only 4/5 * 35 = <<4/5*35=28>>28 packages.
That means, Max could deliver 245 - 28 - 245/1 - 70 - 50 = <<245-28-245/1-70-50=-148>>-148 more packages.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 245/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
